p: The analyses for GCâ€“MS were carried out on an Agilent Technologies gas chromatograph 6890N series gas chromatograph coupled to an Agilent mass detector, series 5973 Inert (Santa Clara, CA, USA), electronic impact (70 eV), with a series 7683 autoinjector. The gas chromatograph was coupled with MSD-ChemStation software to recognize the compounds of the volatile fraction of the L. paniculata species.
